item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Passport Photos (592 points | 78 comments)
2. The English Paradox: Four Decades of Life and Language in Japan (25 points | 11 comments)
3. Guy gives a negative review to Battlezone after playing 8k hours; He's right (143 points | 47 comments)
4. Trudeau government bans TikTok from operating in Canada (471 points | 264 comments)
5. Visualizing binary files with ImHex's DSL, the "pattern language" (62 points | 4 comments)
6. 131M American Buildings (116 points | 25 comments)
7. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (307 points | 133 comments)
8. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (287 points | 79 comments)
9. Creating Runtime and Application Images with JLink (9 points | 1 comment)
10. Don't return named tuples in new APIs (46 points | 36 comments)
11. One year, 41M digits: How Luke Durant found the largest known prime number (38 points | 13 comments)
12. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (208 points | 44 comments)
13. Launch HN: Midship (YC S24) – Turn PDFs, docs, and images into usable data (64 points | 41 comments)
14. Physicists spot quantum tornadoes twirling in a 'supersolid' (62 points | 2 comments)
15. Australia proposes ban on social media for those under 16 (97 points | 45 comments)
16. Show HN: Aide, an open-source AI native IDE (162 points | 122 comments)
17. Forget CDK and AWS's insane costs. Pulumi and DigitalOcean to the rescue (109 points | 59 comments)
18. The evolutionary mystery of the German cockroach (25 points | 3 comments)
19. The deep learning boom caught almost everyone by surprise (248 points | 156 comments)
20. Monorepo – Our Experience (141 points | 147 comments)
21. Model Predictive Control in the Browser with WebAssembly (100 points | 13 comments)
22. Hacking cars in JavaScript (Replay attacks in the browser with the HackRF) (54 points | 1 comment)
23. Listening in on the Mysterious Marbled Murrelet (7 points | discuss)
24. Nvidia Rides AI Wave to Pass Apple as Largest Company (7 points | 1 comment)
25. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (144 points | 17 comments)
26. Exposure to phthalate compromises brain function in adult vertebrates (96 points | 34 comments)
27. Switch 2 will be backwards compatible with Switch (295 points | 181 comments)
28. WebSockets cost us $1M on our AWS bill (270 points | 160 comments)
29. 3D Rotation Design (109 points | 27 comments)
30. Useful built-in macOS command-line utilities (711 points | 201 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
